name: Darth_Arrid
content:
Darth Arrid was a male Dark Lord of the Sith of Human or Sith pureblood descent who served on the Dark Council of the reconstituted Sith Empire sometime before the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. A child of Dark Councilor Darth Vax, the Sith was relatively young when he succeeded his mother on the Council after her death, assuming the title of Darth Arrid in the process. However, his mother persisted as a Force ghost and manipulated her son behind the scenes, turning him into a mouthpiece for her will, and it took the rest of the Council four years to realize that Arrid was simply Vax's puppet.
Darth Arrid was first mentioned in the "Force Ghost" Codex entry in Knights of the Fallen Empire, the 2015 Digital Expansion to the 2011 BioWare video game, Star Wars: The Old Republic.
